website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for a cheaper cockroach bait station should check out this helpful product from Combat.
pros: Remarkably inexpensive when compared with similar products
Kills larger roaches along with their nests and colonies
cons: Does not work well for other bugs
Baby roaches are particularly immune to this product

website_summaries.verdict: Large roach bait and powerful insecticide combination designed to kill at the source (nest).
pros: Reasonably priced, long-lasting formulation utilizing powerful insecticide hydramethylnon
Convenient bait stations can be put wherever roaches are a problem, best under sink, behind toilets or appliances
No mess, no activation, child-resistant units are ready to use
cons: These units don't work with all cockroach species and may need to be used in conjunction with other insecticides

customer_reviews.title: This did not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: It may be effective on some roaches. But the ones in Florida just laughed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Roach killers
customer_reviews.text: They killed all my roaches. I started to see a large Roach almost every day a month ago. We moved into this house 6 months ago they must have been waiting in the walls. After 1 week of use I saw a few pale looking roaches, now I see none. I will replace the traps with fresh ones to make sure they stay dead.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B

customer_reviews.title: There are other options that actually work
customer_reviews.text: I can't confirm if this actually works. When I just had these, I still had roaches. I kept everything in my apartment spotless, yet I'd spot a roach just about everyday with no change after I got these. I ended up getting the combat gel in the squeeze tube after, and Damascus earth in some crevices, and only then did they finally seem to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for German cockroach
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do anything for the problem in my friend's apartment. I watched those nasty things crawl a wide circle around these everywhere I put them down. It's like they saw a sign saying "Roach Hotel" and were like "Gross! I'm not going in there!" They are the German cockroach. They're doing construction on her complex and they are literally crawling out of the decades old woodwork. Diatomaceous earth and constant cleaning has done more than any bait or traps.
customer_reviews.author: eviloveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review, because I wanted to really see if this would work. After hours of reading mixed reviews I decided to order this. ‘MISTAKE’ Didn’t do anything, AT ALL. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Queen OrieL

customer_reviews.title: They survived the asteroid that killed the dinosaurs but can't survive this
customer_reviews.text: Had a minor roach problem so I bought a box of these and put them around the area where I saw the little buggers. I don't see them anymore so it seems it did the job. Adios roaches!
customer_reviews.author: NickNYC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work ...save your money and time!
customer_reviews.text: These don’t work...I don’t see how big flying cockroaches could ever crawl into one of these?!! It’s definitely not made for huge cockroaches. I placed these all over my home and have not seen any dead ones yet. I’ve encountered 2 new ones. These don’t work. It’s been 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: bargainshopper247

customer_reviews.title: no more roaches!
customer_reviews.text: We live in north Florida, where large roaches just live everywhere, even outside. we had the pest control people out twice but still spotted a couple roaches - I had my husband scatter these motels around the house and months later and still, knock on wood!, not a single roach!! success!!!
customer_reviews.author: genevieve davis

customer_reviews.title: A slow death
customer_reviews.text: I just set out some new traps and since I don’t watch them all the time I’m not sure if they attract the roaches or just intrigue them. The picture shows a roach that just had some of the bait dying a slow death.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than the caramel drizzle stuff
customer_reviews.text: Basically I kept having an issue with cockroaches being in my garage. I would especially see them if I went into my garage at night. I despise cockroaches (as I’m sure most people do), however I do not like using the caramel drizzle product that you are supposed to squirt in cabinets and on the wall, so I chose this instead. I put four of these out (one for every corner of my garage). After a week of use, I have not seen a single cockroach (even when I check in the middle of the night), I’m so happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Haven't seen one since!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a roach (!!!!!) run under my stove from my pantry the other night. About a week before that my son found a dead roach inside a bag of bread. I wanted to burn the house down but decided to try these. My son said he sees one in their upstairs bathroom every few days or so as well so we put one of these on the floor in the pantry & one under his bathroom sink. Nobody has seen a roach since, that was about 3 weeks ago. I don't know how long these take to work but it's gotta be pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm... Wow 😮
customer_reviews.text: First time buying anything like this. Since moving to Florida every day I see at least 2-3 roaches a day - normally in / near the trash. Since the 1st day I placed these, haven’t seen even ONE. I was not expecting that strong of a result. No reason not to give this 5 stars. I could imagine if you leave food around the house & are not generally “clean” it would be more difficult to place them but if you understand how/where/why you are having an issue these do the job flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Beware this product NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER HAD ROACHES. My recent testing for allergies showed I am being exposed somewhere, so I wanted a product that would allow me to find out if I getting an roaches in the house. This product does not allow you to do that. In my stupidity I thought that it would do that. I purchased 4 boxes and only opened and tried one. Since this does not do what I thought it would, I do not need the 3 other unopened boxes but Amazon will not allow me to return. Unless you know for sure that you have roaches, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Exercise gal

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Spray! These Things Work!
customer_reviews.text: We had a disgusting infestation of roaches in our apartment. They were everywhere! I bought my first pack of these on a whim, just hoping they would help, but not expecting much. I was happily surprised to see that in less than a week, these things had completely annihilated our roach population. For almost a year, we haven't seen ANY roaches. Only recently, did we see one. I immediately bought another pack of these traps and replaced the old ones. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: John Bridges

customer_reviews.title: I'm Shocked!
customer_reviews.text: At night on my back porch when the motion detector would come on I would see hundreds of cockroaches running in all directions. After two weeks with all eight Combat Bait Stations, I don't see any now, I have been looking each night. This stuff evidently works very well and I'm shocked it worked so fast. I will give updates later.
customer_reviews.author: FlyTech

customer_reviews.title: I have had great luck with this product before and I have seen ...
customer_reviews.text: I caught one of my cats laying in wait for what turned out to be a roach. I have had great luck with this product before and I have seen no indication that I have any left in my little studio since I put them out. All Combat products get my highest recommendations'.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Voigt

customer_reviews.title: Dead bugs are good!
customer_reviews.text: Dead bugs are the best. My neighbor was doing yard work and I suddenly had the big ones every night, 2-3 sometimes. Even had one in my shoe!! As soon as I started setting traps I saw dead ones!! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have an odor out of the package so I would keep them away from food and much larger as presented
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet as I found a roach in my drawer with some granola bars and decided to order these. First they're much larger than you imagine and I strategically placed but found another roach in that drawer. I don't know if it's the product or it just hasn't had time to work yet but they do have an odor when they come out of the package and I wouldn't put the near food to start
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got a puppy last month and kept finding roaches in the backyard that were attracted to his poop (it provides them warmth, moisture, food, etc). Everyday I would find at least one roach in the backyard. Spraying poison around the house helped, but wasn't killing the 'leap-roaches' and the roaches it was killing would end up laying around in the backyard for my puppy to potentially find and eat. I decided to try bait even though previously I never liked the idea of 'baiting over more roaches' so I had low expectations. Ever since laying the 6 traps down around my backyard I haven't seen a single roach in weeks. Very pleasantly surprised by the results.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Crappy neighbors get you infested?
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the small combat traps. If you don't have time to spray daily, these will kill. My house is stacked with wood trim, a haven for German roaches. Haven't seen any since putting these out.
customer_reviews.author: Mild111Top Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK! DO NOT BUY THIS! Store bought Combat Large Roach Baits works better
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as the product bought at Walmart. Packaging was different. We placed this item in our garage and the large roaches were unaffected. A week later we placed the Combat Large Roach baits bought at Walmart and they were wiped out in a couple of days. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning results! After fighting with big cockroaches for months (stopped pest control service) these nasty creatures completely disappeared within a week! They were only increasing in numbers. It got so bad there was always one or two on the wall or floor of nearly every room I went in! Ewwwww! There was a very noticeable reduction in a few days, then totally gone except for the very occasional obviously dying one one on the floor. I'm ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works at once. Roaches be gone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Moved in to our first new home to see 4 roaches in the garage by a side door. Woke up in thebmorning to see one strolling in the kitchen 😳😳😳 I've never been more disgusted in my life. Luckily I found combat on Amazon and ordered it right away. I now see one dead cockroach every few days in the garage. Not a single live one is to be seen..I'd advice anyone to buy extra to have on hand just in case those disgusting pests make an appearance!!
customer_reviews.author: PiggieD

customer_reviews.title: Not even a little effective
customer_reviews.text: I see zero signs of these traps working. I placed them all over where i see the roaches come and go. And still every morning I see them come and go. Mind you, I don't have an infestation. Just a few. So you'd think 8 traps could handle the few I do have. But I see no sign of that. If it changes, I'll update my review. But I don't have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My apartment management was crap and claimed to send out pest control but couldn't stop the neighbor's roaches from getting in our apartment. Threw these under the fridge and in the pantry and it was amazing! Within a week I stopped seeing them! It was really worth trying I would recommend this for small batches. If you have a massive problem you will need to find the source but for stray bugs this worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Appleman

customer_reviews.title: Not a roach to be seen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a home and it had a bit of a roach problem. I live in Florida and it’s something everyone deals with at some point. I used all traps at once in areas around the house (attic, under dishwasher, pantry, washing machine, bathroom vanities etc. ). After about a month the roaches had disappeared!! It has now been 6 months and I have not seen a roach, or any carcasses! Very happy with these and will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works and destroys bugs!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a not so great apartment, and the exterminator has not been able to rid our home of water bugs. So as a last ditched effort, we bought this, and we are now almost 2 months with not a single waterbug to be found!. We put all traps out, understove and fridge, under tables, bathroom and closets. Thankfully we are moving and found a great exterminator, but will always keep these handy.l
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Giants Roaches No More
customer_reviews.text: We had a giant roach problem in our rental that started back in June. We were only seeing one every 3 to 5 days in the kitchen always by the same set of bottom cabinets and by August I was over it. Purchased these traps and put down 3 (one in the kitchen cabinet where I suspected they were coming from) and two more behind some appliances in the kitchen and by the third day of use we saw two large roaches in the kitchen which we spot killed. It’s been 3 weeks and we haven’t seen a single one since. Will keep renewing traps until our lease is up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Each day less and less, Really works
customer_reviews.text: Building remodeling sent these lovelies from the walls out to apartments.Yikes, as soon as these were set out, I felt total relief. We have guinea pigs, they are in cages but this did not affect them. Every day there are less and less. I don't see any but the motels are staying in place. We bought extras to hold onto so we can replace them.Security, feeling safe, this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvPrime

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my roach problem!
customer_reviews.text: My apartment complex became overrun with cockroaches. Though they still persisted for a week or so, this product without a doubt solved my issue!
customer_reviews.author: T. Soprano

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a condo in FL in a complex where they do spray for bugs. Everything was great for 1.5 years. I travel back and forth from MI. Was horrified to find some palmetto bugs (FL version of roaches) in my home when I returned (which I leave very CLEAN with no food around when I go back to MI). Paranoid, I placed these all round. No bugs last time I arrived. Hallelulia!
customer_reviews.author: Patti O

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Roaches basically acted like this wasn't there. They would crawl over it like it was nothing and there was no improvement after months of using these. Bought a spray and it worked like a charm. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works well but be patient. It does take time to work and doesnt happen over night. Last thing I want is a roach infestation but we had one. Used product and began to see a difference in about a month or two. Be sure to replace them when the directions tell you to , it makes a difference. I spend around 20 dollars every six months and its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: stacey verespie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work! I found a cockroach in my kitchen two weeks ago. It ran fast so I can't kill it successfully. I bought this cockroach killer and put 4 of them in my kitchen. The result is I still saw that cockroach every day. It has been 2 weeks and my husband killed it tonight. I was trying to return this product but it doesn't allow to return that's why I only one star to it.
customer_reviews.author: Liu X.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! Yes!  Perfect for Stinky Bug Infestation
customer_reviews.text: In the New England area this early Fall we had a huge stinky bug infestation in our shed. We were literally sweeping out the shed 2 times a day for over a week. We looked online and read that as long as they were not coming into the house that it was a good thing. Stinky bugs supposedly do no damage but boy do they sure smell. Our handyman suggested this product and boy did it work. The traps were placed all along the base of the shed (the whole package). Absolutely, perfect suggestion and very good advice.
customer_reviews.author: Greatlady42

customer_reviews.title: Mostly worked, still seeing those damn things after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I deployed these about 2 weeks ago, it took a week to see any effectiveness. and it has finally made a difference. I was overun with the damn things and have spent a lot of money on ineffective sprays. This is a better solution but hasn't seemed to get rid of them completely. Good for managing a sever infestation, use with a bomb to get rid of em completely.
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've used these many of times before purchasing on amazon. I live in the country surrounded by woods and trees which means bugs galore. I have a major fear of cockroaches and spiders and lately I noticed dead cockroaches in the house which meant it was time for replacement traps. The product is easy to use, you simply tuck it away and let it do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Possible coincidence...but worked?
customer_reviews.text: I received these the same day I kicked my cheating ex boyfriend out. The roaches disappeared within days of putting them in the house. I'm not sure what got rid of the roaches, this product or the fact that his stinky ass left my house. Either way the roaches are gone and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My go-to for roach bait
customer_reviews.text: I buy this bait every year when I first see the roach coming to my house. After I set it up, the roach is never coming back. This is my second year I use this product. I would definitely use it again for next year. I would really recommend going straight using this product if you spot the house roach inside your home or in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Dang

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta start by saying I rarely write a review. This product definitely deserves one. My office and surrounding areas suddenly got infested by roaches. I would only see a few here and there but it got to the point where I would see hundreds of baby roaches and decided to try this product. 4 days later and all baby roaches I see are dead all over. The few big ones I've seen are either dead or dying. One just came in my office trying to walk until it finally just dying there on the spot. I can honestly say this works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Works slowly than the others
customer_reviews.text: The strategy here is to make roaches sick and die after 24hs. It takes that long because the idea is that they will return to their nest and infect the other roaches there. The traps themselves are big and will work with either large or small roaches. They are NOT discrete, they will be seen by people if you don't hide them. If you want roaches killed ASAP, buy something else with Fipronil but know that it might not have the same nest killing effect. I am taking one star out because the killing speed should have been specified in the box.
customer_reviews.author: ct2000

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see anymore roaches afterwards
customer_reviews.text: Moved into my apartment, which was advertised as luxury... and one month after I moved in I saw a roach in my food cabinet... Roaches are pretty fast, so I wasn't able to get rid of it. I came here, and I bought two boxes of this stuff. Once I spread the pucks across my apartment, mainly in the kitchen and bathroom, I didn't see a roach ever again. The back of the box states that roaches share food, so once it shares this with the colony they won't be visiting you again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKED LIKE A MIRACLE
customer_reviews.text: After some flooding in my kitchen, I was struggling to contain a cockroach problem. I tried sprays, including buying a hand pump sprayer for mixing up a gardening chemical to spray, like I was a freaking exterminator. Those things worked spotty or not at all. I put these bait stations down and after 2 days, the only live roaches I saw were writhing in their death throes from being poisoned. Now a week later, I see NONE. EVER. THIS IS THE SOLUTION!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Bullard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I Bought Two Sets But Who Knows if They Work ?
customer_reviews.text: I have a new roach issue in my apartment so I bought 2 sets of these and spread them all throughout the home. It states that the product "Kills the Nest". Well I still have roaches. How do I know if these items have even caught a roach ? I shook a couple of the traps but nothing came out, no dead bugs. I think I saw one roach crawling over the top of a trap once with no attraction to enter the slots to die.
customer_reviews.author: hgordonf

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I found 1 American cockroach and 1 German cockroach at different times over the summer. Naturally I freaked out. Bought these and haven't seen another one. I don't know if they were a random stray or what but haven't seen a cockroach since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: So I am writing this review a little over three wks after putting them out. I ordered these right after I saw my first roach a little less then a month ago which I correctly assumed to be the beginnings of a infestation. I haven't seen any dead roaches around so not sure if it is actually killing any but it most definitely hasn't stopped them from hatching babies and increasing. I now see both adult and babies every so often scurrying around in the kitchen. I have now picked up other products in the hopes I can't stop this infestation from becoming worse, it would have been nice to stop them when it first started.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Chang

customer_reviews.text: These work great. I live in an apartment with constant roaches because of the neighbors and I thought there was nothing I could do about it but the roaches are gone now, and I will keep buying these as needed for it to stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Killed the suckers the following day with no sign of return!
customer_reviews.text: Literally put them out the day I got them in the mail. Havnt seen one roach since. All the big a$$ ones are MIA and only saw one baby one the next day. Safe to say that these things work... And if they come back, I'm buying more to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Geezy2010

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The roaches did not die. I moved one to clean around it and a roach ran out of it. I still have roaches. As a matter of fact, I just moved one to clean around it and a roach ran out. Maybe that's how they kill the nest but given the baby roaches I see I'm pretty sure that hasn't happened.
customer_reviews.author: Ppike

customer_reviews.title: No more roaches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member that was having some roach issues. Seriously in a matter of days we found dead roaches and the problem is gone ever since. I would highly recommend this product. This home really had a infestation and this worked when not a lot of products were working. Paired with other products I found this to be so helpful. This product seems like a long term plan that does the job quickly and also long term.
customer_reviews.author: Mpeter

customer_reviews.title: works better than others I tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have these on my Subscribe and Save for every 3 month delivery. I also have electronic devices in my bathrooms in kitchen. Here in Florida if you stop using them you will soon be over run again. We also have trouble with raccoons and possums and found a new spray on Amazon that seems to be helping o keep them away! One of the joys of FL living!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: We live in a swamp pretty much, so it's really easy to have bug ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in a swamp pretty much, so it's really easy to have bug problems, even if things are kept clean. We set these out in a few places and within a couple of weeks not a single roach was seen, even if food was left out.
customer_reviews.author: robert welsh

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Have been seeing giant American cockroaches around the house almost every other day. They are so big (almost 2 inches) and nerve-racking! After I placed 12 baits everywhere in the house about 10 days ago, I have only seen 1 dead cockroach which I saw today right beside the one of the baits. This thing is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Skip these traps
customer_reviews.text: I don't think any of them even cared about this. It was ok to try out but after a month we called an exterminator. Luckily they didn't skyrocket out of control in the mean time but we also used a powder and spray from other companies that maybe helped a bit better. Save your money, try something else, or before it's too late call an exterminator! These German cockroaches are finally dying off.
customer_reviews.author: Peter & Fran

customer_reviews.title: They aren't 100% to completely eradicate, but
customer_reviews.text: Roaches are disgusting, hard to trap, little critters that breed like crazy. Though these do not eradicate them completely, they sure do kill some of em. This, along with an exterminator have been our war plan so far.
customer_reviews.author: Taterhawk

customer_reviews.title: They will die slowly
customer_reviews.text: I did an experiment with this product. Caught like 4 cockroaches to see how long it takes Them to die. (Sorry? Not so sorry?) It took them about 3-4 weeks to finally see them die. Which comes to my conclusion that as they go back to their colony and mate, it spreads the toxins and kills them slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Kills roaches.
customer_reviews.text: I started using these over a year ago and our roach problem went away. Cheaper than an exterminator and easy to use. Plus, it's actually what my exterminator was using, so we just skipped the middle man.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the roaches that were crawling around at our place were resistant to the poison in the bait? I left all 8 units out and did not notice a difference in the amount of cockroaches. I don't even think they went inside the unit to consume the bait. Hard to tell. Will stick to glue traps so I can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Best one plus cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many types of insect killers of this type and this one seems to work the best. Money is not the object when killing bugs so the fact that this one is cheaper than the other brands was just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: My apartment is heavily infested with coaches, I am willing to try any method to eliminate these disgusting creatures. This bait was my first trial but it did not work as expected, I still found a few coaches every morning in the kitchen when I turned on the light.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Kills nasty south Florida palmetto bugs
customer_reviews.text: I live in South Florida and nasty palmetto bugs fly into my house when I let the dogs out and hide in my dishwasher. I laid these out and caught them in a few days. They crawled out and died.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for large roached. Infestation continues and I haven't seen any dead roaches...the ones spotted are very alive! Going back to Roach Motel.
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem

customer_reviews.title: Dead roaches everywhere, although a handful of roaches still ...
customer_reviews.text: Dead roaches everywhere, although a handful of roaches still alive. After a month the number of roaches that appeared at night reduced. The roaches that are still around are smaller. Plenty of the big ones are hardly ever seen anymore. I wondering if I should double up the traps for both small and large roaches. I believe the affected roaches in our home, as I am told by our landlord, German Cockroach. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Phalla

customer_reviews.title: It's the BEST Bait out there !!!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida and with Hot and Rainy weather the roaches seem to always find a way in. Drains, doors, attic I really don't know but I hate them. I would sometimes see one or two every few days somewhere near the kitchen, laundry area. Until, I found this awesome Roach Bait. Haven't seen a Bug, Roach or anything creepy in months. I think it kills more than roaches 🤔 Who cares I'm so happy.
customer_reviews.author: KD from Fl.

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I live in coastal Virginia. Most summers in varying degrees we get bothered with the large American Cockroaches. I started using these traps out in my kitchen about 10 days ago. Since placing the traps I am not seeing dead roaches but I am not seeing any at all. I placed a couple of traps outside also. So far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chesbay

customer_reviews.title: Smelly. Not odorless.
customer_reviews.text: It says odorless. I have a very sensitive nose. Let me tell you. It does have an oder. It isn't the worst smell but it is a little pungent, especially if left in a drawer or cabinet as it is advertised. They shouldn't say odorless. Other than that, seems effective.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: (this works) buy it use it kill them all.
customer_reviews.text: Works when nothing else did. I tried everything nothing worked. Just moved in and bugs bugs bugs. I got this cheap little things and BOOM WOW !!!! Less than 2 weeks I can’t find a living bug roach!!! I’m so happy.
customer_reviews.author: hoyt

customer_reviews.title: So simple yet so effective!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mainly for outdoors. At night, there is an infestation of roaches in the grass and near where I set out food and water for these adorable wild bunnies that come hang out. I would shine a light on the area at night and it was like Joe’s Apartment! Also, I would find some roaches in the washroom. I set out all eight on my back patio, washroom, and near the area I see ‘em at night. It’s been three nights and last night I only saw one lone roach! Very effective. And I never see the bunnies go anywhere near it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our master bath was infested with cockroaches (shudder). I tried several natural ways to get rid of them and nothing was working. I put out a couple of these traps on the floor and a couple in my cabinets. After several days I found a couple of dead roaches on the floor. I haven't seen any since (dead or alive)! Happy dance.
customer_reviews.author: Noahs' mother

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Roaches
customer_reviews.text: We had just moved into our new place and I put these out after seeing 1 roach. I haven't seen anymore since and we've been here for almost 3 months. Definitely worked!
customer_reviews.author: bffwct

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me at all!
customer_reviews.text: These traps definitely did not work for me. I had a bad problem with baby roaches in my bathroom and wanted to kill them off before they could grow bigger. I put 3 in my bathroom and was still seeing roaches after a month. The traps were also suuuper small, so definitely not going to work for palmetto bugs or adult roaches. Save your money and just buy some borax, it works significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to have any effect.
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to work at all. I've had these bait stations positioned all over the place in my kitchen and bathrooms for several weeks. My cockroach problem doesn't seem to have diminished in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Killed in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Started to see large roaches at night in kitchen. I purchased these and placed them where I saw “evidence” of them or where I see them. It took about 2 weeks to completely get rid of them. In the first couple weeks, I started seeing them in weird places throughout the house. I assume they were either dying or looking for food. We stopped finding dead ones after about one month. We still keep baits around and find the occasional dead one every so often. It worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bessent

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The product never worked. It claims to kill all roaches but nothing happened for me. Really not satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome-One

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Had absolutely no effect on my roaches. Zero. I have to get a professional after wasting my time and money on 3 different types of killer. The professional said that they have developed immunity to bait and they have to keep switching it up. I have German cockroaches and will need multiple visits to kill them off.
customer_reviews.author: Julie T from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and haven’t seen a roach since laying them out!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and haven’t seen a roach since laying them out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference within 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! We had a roach problem in our apartment and within 24 hours I noticed a difference. One month later when I am writing this review my boyfriend just cleaned hundreds of dead roaches (disgusting i know) out from underneath our sink. This product eliminates the problem at the source and not just the ones you see like other sprays and such. Would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hector R.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. The very fist time I bought them, I thought they wouldn't work as many products I've tried failed. Took a few weeks to kick in, and it basically reduced the roaches to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: C.Martinez19

customer_reviews.title: Not for ordinary roaches
customer_reviews.text: Roaches are bad. But Cock Roaches are the absolute worst! I bought these Combat traps to keep in my underpants because the last thing I want is Cock Roaches. I'm not taking chances when it comes to this variety of roach. I explored the other available options, but I'm not inclined on spraying poison on my sensitive area, if you ya know what I mean. Hopefully these do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: jsr

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs. Slept better knowing that.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and thought I saw a roach. I bought these as a precaution and placed them around. Never seen another bug after that. So they either worked really good or it was just a random bug not a roach lol. Either way it gave me the peace of mind that my problem would be over soon and that was good enough for me. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: The Hudson’s

customer_reviews.title: Small roaches dine as well
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done! Low profile, low odor. Lasts a long time --killer meals for large water roaches.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: But ASAP if you have roaches!
customer_reviews.text: I had a roach issue and these stopped it! I had to use all of them (as the directions state) and it fixed the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Moderate roach problem with bugs visible at night. After placing the bait traps in strategic areas around my apartment, all roaches disappeared within 10 days. Can’t recommend enough for a quick, no hassle fix.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: i have lived in my apartment for 17 years and have never had even an ant. we had a heatwave and i saw three roaches. i freaked out and ordered these. i put them in areas i thought would be good. he building sent am exterminator and he said that these worked really well as there were several roaches in them. i recommend but keep out of reach of dogs. mine ate one and vomited like 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy pal.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the Everpest Bug Repellent. It seemed to have been doing a good job, but I would see a roach or two when I turned on the lights. I received the Combat roach trap a couple of days ago and immediately I have not seen a roach since. Time will tell, but as for now I am amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Adolph Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Works just buy a lot and put 2 in every room
customer_reviews.text: I put 20 of the baits down about 2 weeks ago, havent seen one big roach yet. I'm just wondering where they all went to die.
customer_reviews.author: KEN S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Baits
customer_reviews.text: After placing a few of these in the garage, I have seen less roaches. We had some big, nasty roaches from the sewer outside and we are so glad they have prevented them from roaming in the garage. I still see a few a month, but a lot less since before. Luckily, they are not inside the home.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQT

customer_reviews.title: kills them dead
customer_reviews.text: wow..this works and so easy..simply place as directed and watch the roaches die..I live in an apartment and I have pets, so I didn't want to have spray or pesticides that were harmful. I placed the traps away from my cats..and waited. it works perfectly. I will keep these around and order more
customer_reviews.author: Sanddee

customer_reviews.title: Combat Is The Best Roach Killer
customer_reviews.text: I always use Combat in my home for both the large and small roaches. I have a small but cozy apartment which is very old, but the Combat keeps the roaches away until it's time to renew the capsules. It has worked for me ever since I discovered using it many, many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fan

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want cockroaches, buy this
customer_reviews.text: I hate hate hate cockroaches. I don't want to see them dead or alive. This system is incredibly easy, foolproof and ensures I almost never see them and living in the tropics, that's saying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Not for all breeds.
customer_reviews.text: I have used in the past with mych success. However the roaches around now are totally disinterested. Talked with my pest control guy and he said only certain breeds of roaches are attracted to combat discs. He offered no hope either. Can't have him in to spray cause I have 2 cats and they don't help either.
customer_reviews.author: newsusie

customer_reviews.title: Well I guess no news is good news?
customer_reviews.text: I got these because we found a roach crawling around in our bathtub - yuck! I have them placed in all 3 bathrooms and in my kitchen and haven't seen anything since. So I am just assuming they are doing their job. :) I feel like not seeing anything is the best evidence that they work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate roaches from your home
customer_reviews.text: Kills roaches and safe for me and my cat. I just punch out a disc and leave anywhere. With in a week or so I saw a noticable difference, to zero roaches being found.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: It is better with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product for sure helps with the spray. spray I think seems to get the little monsters NOW and the Combat gets them at the nest. But I think I have a big nest because the seems to go away then all of sudden the start coming back??? not sure what is for sure. It is better with this product
customer_reviews.author: LMBP

customer_reviews.title: May or may not work for you...
customer_reviews.text: Used as instructed and 3 months later: Roaches are still present. Specifically got this to kill the "NEST" but we are still living with them. Going to try another product. I was expecting to see dead poisoned roaches everywhere but I can't even say I have seen one after using this. Just buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Riggs Royena

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after I saw a small roach in my bathroom. I put them all over my house in case my new bug friend brought over some buddies. Its been a while now and I've seen 3-4 roaches since.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burt

customer_reviews.title: 'Combat' Veteran
customer_reviews.text: My folks have been using this stuff for years; fortunately i have not needed before now. This stuff is tried and true, i wont use anything else. I saw 1 roach in my house and freaked so i bought what i think is too many traps, but never too careful. They're cheap enough to get plenty and place in both bathrooms, kitchen, and garage.
customer_reviews.author: FoggyMcDuffman

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It attracts cock roaches fairly well, but the inside space is to small, I saw a few of them blocked by other roaches from entering, and walking around it, so disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: dreamwander

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the garage. I live in a townhouse complex, and our garages share walls. Cockroaches are a problem in the garage. These things work to kill the critters that are trying to invade my garage. I never see live ones... only an occasional dead one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Actually helps haven’t seen a roach since I bought this. Wasn’t paid in any way to say this. I’m shocked that it works tbh.
customer_reviews.author: khalia Spencer

product_meta.title: Combat Roach Killing Bait, Large Roach Bait Station, Kills the Nest, Child-Resistant, 8 Count
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Combat Roach Killing Bait is specially designed for large roaches, waterbugs, and palmetto bugs. Kill the nest, getting rid of cockroach problems at the source with this specially designed large roach bait product long lasting formula with the powerful insecticide, containing Hydramethylnon. Easy to use, no mess baits do not require activation. Simply place them wherever you see or have seen roaches and relax while they kill non stop day and night. Best used in areas like under sinks, behind toilets, and behind appliances, killing the ones you see and the ones you don't roaches kills roaches and destroys the nest. Contains eight child resistant bait stations.
feature_bullets: Get rid of cockroach problems at the source with this specially Designed Large roach bait product containing Hydramethylnon
Easy to use, no mess baits do Not require activation
Best used in areas like under sinks, behind toilets, and behind appliances, killing the ones you see and the ones you don't and destroys the nest
Eight child resistant bait stations are Included
Simply place them wherever you see or have seen roaches and relax while they kill non sTop day and night
